meanings.definition: To melt or cause to melt excessively.
meanings.sent1: The sun can overmelt the ice on a warm day.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to overmelt the chocolate when you are baking.
meanings.sent3: The candle overmelted and made a big mess on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness overmelted my heart like warm butter on toast.
meanings.sent5: The heat from the fire overmelted the plastic toy into a puddle.

meanings.definition: The act of melting too much.
meanings.sent1: The overmelt of the ice caused a flood in the street.
meanings.sent2: The overmelt of the cheese made it hard to dip the chips.
meanings.sent3: The overmelt of the ice cream turned it into a soup.
meanings.sent4: The overmelt of the snow created a slippery mess on the road.
meanings.sent5: The overmelt of the candle wax formed colorful patterns on the tablecloth.
